name: places/ChIJ5QFQ4OlbwokRmZzRmwKX6uE

displayName.text: Hertz Car Rental - Recto Place Battery Park HLE

formattedAddress: 250 Albany St, New York, NY 10280, USA
adrFormatAddress: 250 Albany St, New York, NY 10280, USA

originalText.text: Wish I could give 0 stars. I can admit I made a mistake when reserving my car and it’s my fault, but the personnel of this department left me speechless. They were so rude and unprofessional. A lady titling herself as the manager, rushed to get me out of the building as she had to attend church. Then after realizing that she wasn’t a manager, not even close to that, I had a call with the actual lady that was the manager (while she was at a drive through ordering something, instead of being at her job). They even threatened to call the police to escort me out of the department, swearing at me and laughing about my situation. Long story short I needed an emergency car and only had a debit card (being 21yo). I made the mistake of booking less than 24h in advance. Even on the wall of the department it stated that it’s illegal, in the state of New York to refuse service according to age and to refuse service when using a debit card. Also I want to state the fact that I used the services of Hertz from the same department less than a year ago and everything went almost smooth. I wouldn’t recommend anyone to rent from this department, it seems cheap and tempting but just use some other service that values their clients more.

originalText.text: Very bad customer service when I returned the car. The lady at the counter had no interest nor patience and wanted to get back to her phone . I wanted to pay using a different card and she conveniently said the card is declined . I knew there was nothing wrong with the card but she just refused to explain what might be causing the issue . Ultimately I called the hertz customer service to find out when you switch the card it takes 24 hrs for the new card to be activated on their system and hence the error . She however had no clue nor any interest in explaining any of it . The car we picked was not cleaned properly, also the air pressure indicator went off even though air pressure was fine wasting so much time . Would never pick a car from here

originalText.text:
Great location, right across from the WTC. Got a great Acura Full Size that brought me to DC.

The Service was just amazing, nicest people, amazing way to start a Sunday. So friendly, so helpful, I felt like I was family here. Really, could not recommend this location more. Thank you Hertz!

originalText.text:
Worst car rental experience  I'm a Hertz President's Circle member, I arrived to the location and I was told they only had 2 vehicles left, 1 fully electric and the other one was a Nissan Altima (gas). Therefore, I had no choice but the Altima as not ideal to rent an electric car. Then I was informed that the tank only had gas enough for 88 miles. I asked if they could fill it up for me, they said no. I only rent from Hertz cause they give you full tank vehicles but it wasn't the case..
Then I left, it was very hot that day, I went to turn on the AC and a horrible smell of pot came out of the vents. I tried to run it for a while but I couldn't cope with it so I had to shut it off. Obviously the guy that rented the car before me must have used a vape or smoked a joint! Also, the windshield had a haze, I thought it was on the outside, so I use the wipers and sprayed but it was out of fluid!!! It actually turned out that the haze was on the inside, probably from the same guy's vape or joint.
For last, one of the back lights didn't work, not sure if a short of the bulb was broken.
This was a really atrocious experience, at almost $200 daily rate. I will open an official complain with Hertz Corporate as their vehicles should be fully checked before given out to customers.

originalText.text:
Very easy to drop off the car. The gentleman who cleans out the car came to the street where I was waiting for someone to get me and brought an item that I left behind in the car.
Quick process and would be happy to rent from this location.
